text.name: input_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_FD
text.text: EV: Differential lock front axle on/off

text.name: input_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_RD
text.text: EV: Differential lock rear axle on/off

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_resetConfigTT
text.text: ATTENTION: This will set all settings for this mod back to its default!

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_reloadConfigTT
text.text: Reload the configuration file from disk. Necessary after manual changes in the XML file.

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_snapTT
text.text: Turn on/off global lane keeping assistent functionality

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_diffTT
text.text: Turn on/off global differential lock functionality

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_hydraulicTT
text.text: Turn on/off global improved hydraulic control functionality

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_HUDdiffTT
text.text: Turn on/off the HUD display for differential lock

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_HUDdmgTT
text.text: Turn on/off the HUD display for damage values

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_HUDfuelTT
text.text: Turn on/off the HUD display for fuel values

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_HUDsnapTT
text.text: Turn on/off the HUD display for the lane keeping assistant driving direction

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_HUDrpmTT
text.text: Turn on/off the HUD display for the RPM number

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_HUDtempTT
text.text: Turn on/off the HUD display for the engine temperature

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_HUDmiscTT
text.text: Turn on/off the HUD display for misc values (e.g. weight)

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_HUDdmgAmountLeftTT
text.text: Display damage values in '% left' rather than '% damaged'

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_snapSettingsAngleTT
text.text: Determines in which degree steps the driving direction is engaged (1°-90°)
